txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken hatchets from brigands near Bree. Weaker brigands carry these, perhaps as a symbol of their station. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'There's a few more brigands that won't be frightening the local folk. You have done a good thing this day.'
'All manner of foul Men about recently. Many brigands are camping out among the fields of Bree-land. The weaker ones carry broken hatchets. Get me those as a favour for the people of Bree.'
Men of Bree Task: Broken Hatchets
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of broken hatchets, found on the weaker brigands throughout Bree-land.
Deliver the broken hatchets to Second-watcher Heathstraw

You have been tasked with finding broken hatchets from the weakest of the brigands currently camping throughout Bree-land. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Broken hatchets from brigands near Bree.
